title: Removing a working set immediately applies changes
description: When removing a working set, the changes are immediately applied instead of waiting for user confirmation.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered accordingly.
EB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view should remain filtered.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it. Observe that the package view is filtered accordingly.
2. Open the working set dialog again, create a second working set, and delete the first working set. Verify that the package view remains filtered as expected.
